attributes.name: no-cancel-outside-dialog
attributes.description: When attribute is present, users cannot click outside the dialog card, in the translucent overlay, to close the dialog which is the default behavior otherwise

attributes.name: dialog-close
attributes.description: Add this attribute to the corresponding footer `<zui-button>`, when clicked it will cancel/close if attribute is present

attributes.name: dialog-confirm
attributes.description: Add this attribute to the corresponding footer `<zui-button>`, when clicked it will close and will trigger the custom event 'close'

properties.name: noCancelOutsideDialog
properties.description: When attribute is present, users cannot click outside the dialog card, in the translucent overlay, to close the dialog which is the default behavior otherwise

events.name: close
events.description: Close event dispatches event details, this fires when users click an element with the `dialog-confirm` attribute present

slots.name: footer
slots.description: Slot for footer `<zui-button>`'s to close or confirm dialog
